typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IValidatorRegistry.Listing storage pointer) view returns (bool)

params.pubKey: Public key for the listing to have rewards claimed

params.challengeId: Challenge id to claim rewards from.

maxRewardRate().details: Calculate the maximum KosuToken a validator can generate
maxRewardRate().return: Maximum KosuToken a validator can generate

minimumBalance().return: Minimum token balance to list and challenge

params.rewardRate: The rate tokens are minted or destroyed over the active listings reward periods
params.tokensToStake: The number of tokes at stake if the order is challenged

stakeholderCut().return: Number of tokens the stakeholder gets after a challenge

validators().details: Expose the list of active validators
validators().return: An array of hex encoded tendermint keys

voting().details: Expose the configured Voting contract address

maxRewardRate().notice: Calculate the maximum KosuToken a validator can generate

validators().notice: Expose the list of active validators

voting().notice: Expose the configured Voting contract address
